title: Tom Cotton tells big donors Donald Trump candidacy won't keep him from running for president
type: Sen. Tom Cotton is readying a potential presidential run in 2024 and is not afraid of facing off against former President Trump, the Arkansas Republican reportedly told a gathering of donors on Tuesday. During a gathering with two dozen of his top donors at the Hay-Adams hotel in Washington, D.C., Cotton detailed the groundwork he's laid for a national campaign, two attendees told Politico. Not wanting to commit to challenging a former president, most potential 2024 contenders have so far been stuck in limbo waiting on Trump to publicly say one way or another on whether he'll run, but not Cotton - he told the group that he would not defer to any other potential candidates, even Trump. Cotton said that he planned to make a final decision on whether to run after the midterm elections....read

title: Now White House signals gas tax holiday IS on the table after states start implementing their own breaks and national average price per gallon hits record high of $5.02
type: Biden is more seriously considering a federal gas tax holiday as prices at the pump continue to soar and the administration is still blaming the surge on Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: Trump will testify alongside Don Jr. and Ivanka on July 15 as part of New York Attorney General's probe into his business - and faces up to $430,000 in fines if he still refuses to comply with his court order
type: James' team claims to have uncovered 'substantial evidence' that the Trump Organization knowingly used misleading financial statements in its business dealings for at least a decade.

title: MAGA Republican who switched from the Democrats calls Biden administration the 'worst in American history' and thanks Trump for his endorsement after getting 85% of the vote in his New Jersey primary
type: Democrat-turned-Republican Rep. Jeff Van Drew won his New Jersey primary in a landslide, which he said Wednesday was down to the Biden administration's historically bad record.

title: 'We can't truly be leaders if we are only living for reelection': Uvalde native Matthew McConaughey tells Democrats and GOP to find a middle ground on guns in tearful speech backing 'responsible' gun owners and paying tribute to kids killed in massacre
type: Matthew McConaughey, a native of Uvalde, Texas, gave an emotional plea for gun reform from the White House, tearing up as he talked about the victims of the massacre and callng for legislaton..

title: Matthew McConaughey will speak at White House press briefing after having dinner with Joe Manchin and spending two days lobbying Congress after the mass shooting in his childhood hometown Uvalde
type: Matthew McConaughey, a native of Uvalde, Texas, who has advocated for gun reform, will speak at Tuesday's White House press briefing.

title: Biden announces FIFTH baby formula flight: White House reveals latest shipment will come from Germany amid mounting questions over why President didn't learn about crisis for two months
type: President Joe Biden on Monday announced a fifth flight from Operation Fly Formula, which will bring infant formula from Germany to the United States.

title: Ron DeSantis says Biden is 'totally off his rocker' over claims administration is threatening to pull school lunch money if they don't adopt LGBTQ policies
type: Department of Agriculture announced early last month that it would crack down on federal food aid going to programs that are not in line with the White House's anti-LGBTQI discrimination policy.

title: Trump files ANOTHER appeal to end New York's investigation into his business practice after paying $110,000 in fines
type: The former president is responding to a ruling made less than a week ago on Friday by US District Judge Brenda Sannes, who was appointed to the bench by Barack Obama in 2014.

title: Biden confirms ANOTHER Ukraine military package that's worth $700 million and includes long-range rocket systems after Kremlin said America was 'fueling the fire'
type: President Joe Biden officially announced a new $700 million security package for the Ukraine amid Russian warnings he was 'adding fuel to the fire' by including medium-range rocket systems.

title: Biden now says he will NOT try and remove Putin from office months after aides were forced to frantically walk back his comments that he 'cannot remain in power'
type: Biden stressed that the U.S. would not work to oust Vladimir Putin and would continue to push for diplomatic ends to the war in Ukraine, even as the U.S. continues to provide weapons to the nation.

title: Biden is 'twisted' his approval is BELOW Trump as a new poll has him below 50% in 49 STATES - including California and New York - and as low as 19% in West Virginia and 23% in Tennessee
type: The president is backed by 40.7 percent of Americans as of Tuesday, while 41.6 percent of voters supported Trump at this point in his term, according to FiveThirtyEight's rolling average.

title: Former Attorney General Bill Barr believes John Durham has uncovered 'seditious' actions against Trump in his Russia probe as jury resumes deliberations in trial of Clinton lawyer accused of lying to the FBI
type: 'The whole Russiagate thing was a grave injustice,' said former AG Bill Barr, who also said there was 'seditious' activity carried out against former President Trump.

title: Biden is 'furious at aides repeatedly walking back his gaffes and undermining his credibility': Joe is also 'angry at staff for dire polls and has to remind them he is President'
type: The report paints a picture of a commander-in-chief who appeared to have thought his decades of Senate experience would have given him an edge only to be left struggling with public relations crises.

title: 'Democracy is not perfect… but it's worth fighting for': Biden pays tribute to Beau, Ukraine and the U.S. troops who died in Afghanistan and Iraq after laying a wreath at Arlington Cemetery's Tomb of the Unknown Soldier
type: During his speech Biden made no mention of the 13 service members who were killed in Afghanistan during a suicide attack amid the military's withdrawal from the country.

title: Biden tells Uvalde families he could give them federal funds to DEMOLISH and rebuild elementary school where 19 children and two teachers were shot and killed after Texas state senator told him kids are too traumatized to go back
type: Democratic Texas State Senator Roland Gutierrez said Biden told him that he was considering giving federal funds to 'raze' and rebuild the school to help the community move on from the mass shooting.

title: Nancy Pelosi slams San Francisco Archbishop for banning her from communion over abortion while still giving sacrament to politicians who back the death penalty, and being 'vehemently' against LGBTQ rights
type: Pelosi questioned whether the archbishop was holding a double standard for banning her from Communion for her position on abortion while keeping quiet about Republicans.

title: Nancy Pelosi receives COMMUNION at Catholic church in Georgetown after Archbishop of San Francisco banned her over her 'extreme' abortion views
type: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi was spotted at Mass in Washington, D.C. on Sunday, where she did receive Holy Communion.

title: Archbishop of San Francisco says Nancy Pelosi's communion ban is because her abortion views are getting 'more extreme' - and the Roe v. Wade leak has 'nothing to do with the timing of it'
type: Archbishop Salvatore Cordileone said during a Friday interview that his 'conscience' made him act against House Speaker Nancy Pelosi within the church.

title: Biden's new press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre was sexually abused by older male cousin between the ages of seven and 10 and would hide in attic to try and avoid him
type: Jean-Pierre wrote that between the ages of seven and 10, an older male cousin would sexually abuse her, forcing her to hide away in an attic crawl space to try and avoid him in her Queens home.

title: Biden's 'disinformation Mary Poppins' blames DISINFORMATION for her resignation and claims critics 'want to put our national security behind their own personal political ambitions'
type: Nina Jankowicz told CNN Thursday night that the heavily criticized board was a victim of politics are previously saying she and her family were given death threats during her tenure.

title: Biden press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre tears into Oklahoma's 'extreme', 'absurd' and 'ultra MAGA' law that bans abortions at fertilization - and says contraception and same-sex marriage are next
type: Jean-Pierre's blistering statement comes as the administration throws its weight behind protecting reproductive rights after the leak of the Roe v. Wade draft.

title: 'I have a child to feed too!' Shocking moment two mothers fight after one 'strips Target shelves bare of baby formula' in Massachusetts as shortage spills over into conflict
type: Two women were caught on camera arguing with one another after one filled her shopping cart full of baby formula. The interaction occurred in the aisles at a Target store in Massachusetts.

title: Biden's 'disinformation Mary Poppins' says she received death threats, people said her family should be 'sent to Russia and killed' and rejects claims she's a 'partisan actor' following her resignation after just three weeks
type: Jankowicz revealed that she just recalled 'one or two days' in recent weeks that she 'didn't report a violent threat' and said her critics 'need to learn how to be adults in the room.'

title: Congress PASSES $28 million in emergency funding for baby formula shortage as Republicans slam White House 'ineptitude' and parents tear into Biden for taking too long to invoke the Defense Production Act during the nationwide crisis
type: The House passed two bills. The first was a measure approved on a 414-9 vote will allow low-income women to purchase more baby formula. The second was the emergency funding.

title: 'This should have been done ages ago': Furious parents blast Biden as he FINALLY invokes emergency powers to stem baby formula shortage and orders Pentagon planes to fly in shipments from overseas - after WEEKS of stalling while kids went hungry
type: Biden invoked the Defense Production Act to boost baby formula production and issued a directive authorizing planes to bring in supplies from overseas, after growing pressure from Congress.

title: Group of 20 Democrats and Republicans push Biden to use the Defense Production Act to solve the baby formula crisis
type: A group of lawmakers is begging Biden to invoke the Defense Production Act to address baby formula issues.

title: Serious injuries suffered by migrants while climbing over the US-Mexico border wall soared by 460% in the two years after Trump ordered height of steel barrier to be increased to 30feet
type: At least 375 suffered severe injuries from 2019 to 2021 after former President Donald Trump order the height increase of 405 miles of the steel border wall in San Diego and Imperial Counties.

title: Karine Jean-Pierre says Biden STILL does not have a decision on whether to cancel up to $10,000 in student loan debt - almost a fortnight after he said he would make a decision 'in a couple of weeks'
type: President Joe Biden still doesn't have action announced on student loan forgiveness despite claiming two weeks ago that he would make a decision 'in a couple of weeks.'

title: Hillary Clinton lawyer 'lied to the FBI' on behalf of her campaign and wanted to spark an 'October Surprise' to embarrass Trump as voters headed to the polls, prosecutors say on first day of Durham's Russia probe trial
type: Former Hillary Clinton lawyer Michael Sussmann's trial finally got underway Tuesday, as prosecutors accused him of trying to engineer an 'October surprise.'
